glsa.title: mdbtools: Multiple Vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in mdbtools, the worst of which

background.p: mdbtools is a set of libraries and utilities for reading Microsoft Access database (MDB) files.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in mdbtools. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
